pkgmetadata.longdescription: 86Box is a low level x86 emulator that runs older operating systems and software designed for IBM PC systems and compatibles from 1981 through fairly recent system designs based on the PCI bus.

use.flag: Enable legacy Dinput mode instead of Xinput for older controllers.
Enable dynamic recompiler, which should provide a better emulation speed.
Enable hardware from devbranch, which may be unstable or unusable.
Enable MIDI MT-32 support through media-libs/munt-mt32emu.
Enable new dynamic recompiler from PCem 15, which should provide an even better emulation speed.
